name: God of Block: Brick Breaker
description:
Destroy the bricks!

God of Block is a turn based breakout-style game.
You can use from arrows to lightning to destroy bricks by throwing them in various angles

▣ Game Features
1. Turn based Breakout-style game!
- Doesn't require complex controls. Just use your one hand and blast those enemy bricks away!
2. Diverse characters!
- Try out Zeus, Hercules and other fascinating characters from the mythologies!
3. Ever-changing backgrounds
- Backgrounds change based on real time with various effects!

▣ How to play the game
1. Choose a character! Each character has their own choice of weapons.
2. Touch screen and swipe it in various angles to fire at the bricks.
3. Hit enemy bricks to eliminate the number to zero to destroy all bricks
4. Each time turn ends, more bricks will fall down.
5. Upgrade weapons and use bombs to destroy enemy bricks at a faster rate.
6. You can earn gold by hitting the $ sing item or by destroying all enemy bricks
7. When enemy bricks reach the red line or the last line of defense, then it's game over.
